languages.text: "Долг перед Неумирающим велит не вмешиваться в замысел Висиря. Я не могу стать для тебя путеводной нитью. Но могу пройти этот путь рядом с тобой".
"My duty to the Undying One prevents me from interfering in the Vizsier's design. I cannot become the thread that guides you. But I can be at your side as you walk that path."
languages.original_text: "Долг перед Неумирающим велит не вмешиваться в замысел Висиря. Я не могу стать для тебя путеводной нитью. Но могу пройти этот путь рядом с тобой".

traits.locale_text: "My duty to the Undying One prevents me from interfering in the Vizsier's design. I cannot become the thread that guides you. But I can be at your side as you walk that path."
"My duty to the Undying One prevents me from interfering in the Vizsier's design. I cannot become the thread that guides you. But I can be at your side as you walk that path."
"My duty to the Undying One prevents me from interfering in the Vizsier's design. I cannot become the thread that guides you. But I can be at your side as you walk that path."
"My duty to the Undying One prevents me from interfering in the Vizsier's design. I cannot become the thread that guides you. But I can be at your side as you walk that path."
"My duty to the Undying One prevents me from interfering in the Vizsier's design. I cannot become the thread that guides you. But I can be at your side as you walk that path."
"My duty to the Undying One prevents me from interfering in the Vizsier's design. I cannot become the thread that guides you. But I can be at your side as you walk that path."

languages.text: «Mi deber hacia el Inmortal me impide interferir con los designios del Visir. No puedo convertirme en su hilo guía, pero puedo caminar a su lado mientras recorre ese camino».
languages.original_text: "My duty to the Undying One prevents me from interfering in the Vizsier's design. I cannot become the thread that guides you. But I can be at your side as you walk that path."

traits.locale_text: «Mi deber hacia el Inmortal me impide interferir con los designios del Visir. No puedo convertirme en su hilo guía, pero puedo caminar a su lado mientras recorre ese camino».

languages.text: 「不死の者への忠誠によって、ヴィジールの計画に干渉することはできない。私にはあなたを導く糸にはなれない。けれど、自分の道を歩むあなたのそばにいることはできる」
languages.original_text: "My duty to the Undying One prevents me from interfering in the Vizsier's design. I cannot become the thread that guides you. But I can be at your side as you walk that path."

traits.locale_text: 「不死の者への忠誠によって、ヴィジールの計画に干渉することはできない。私にはあなたを導く糸にはなれない。けれど、自分の道を歩むあなたのそばにいることはできる」

languages.text: “我对不死之神负有责任，无权干涉宿老的计划。我无法成为引导你的丝线，但当你踏上道路时，我可以在你身边陪伴你。”
languages.original_text: "My duty to the Undying One prevents me from interfering in the Vizsier's design. I cannot become the thread that guides you. But I can be at your side as you walk that path."

traits.locale_text: “我对不死之神负有责任，无权干涉宿老的计划。我无法成为引导你的丝线，但当你踏上道路时，我可以在你身边陪伴你。”

languages.text: "Meine Pflicht gegenüber dem Todlosen verbietet es mir, in die Pläne des Wesirs einzugreifen. Ich kann nicht der Faden werden, der Euch leitet. Aber ich kann an Eurer Seite sein, wenn Ihr diesen Pfad beschreitet."
languages.original_text: "My duty to the Undying One prevents me from interfering in the Vizsier's design. I cannot become the thread that guides you. But I can be at your side as you walk that path."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Pflicht gegenüber dem Todlosen verbietet es mir, in die Pläne des Wesirs einzugreifen. Ich kann nicht der Faden werden, der Euch leitet. Aber ich kann an Eurer Seite sein, wenn Ihr diesen Pfad beschreitet."

languages.text: « Mon devoir envers l'Immortel m'empêche d'interférer dans les plans du vizir. Si je ne peux pas être le fil qui vous guide, je peux néanmoins me tenir à vos côtés lorsque vous emprunterez ce chemin. »
languages.original_text: "My duty to the Undying One prevents me from interfering in the Vizsier's design. I cannot become the thread that guides you. But I can be at your side as you walk that path."

traits.locale_text: « Mon devoir envers l'Immortel m'empêche d'interférer dans les plans du vizir. Si je ne peux pas être le fil qui vous guide, je peux néanmoins me tenir à vos côtés lorsque vous emprunterez ce chemin. »

languages.text: "Ölmeyen'e karşı yükümlülüğüm, Vezir'in tasarımına müdahale etmemi engelliyor. Sana kılavuzluk edecek iplik ben olamam ancak bu yolda yürürken sana eşlik edebilirim."
languages.original_text: "My duty to the Undying One prevents me from interfering in the Vizsier's design. I cannot become the thread that guides you. But I can be at your side as you walk that path."
